update.description:
issue #2097

PR based on the patch from @mallanmba. 

I added an integration test that passes on ubuntu but disabled it on OSX as I realized that wide angle camera doesn't work there due to the version of the shaders. Downgrading the version should fix it. I'll address that separately.

Note there is a typo in the branch name..


jenkins:

[nvidia-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/712/) - ok. warning fixed in daf5cac

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/742/) - ok
update.title: Fix wide angle camera background color

content.raw: ya we're also missing a few others like `multicamera` and `depth`. Let's get the bg color fix in first? The `*ToSDF` function requires adding corresponding proto files and tests which could increase the size of this PR a bit.

content.raw:
I tested this with a docker container of xenial and ogre 1.9 and the test fails for me:

~~~
[ RUN      ] WideAngleCameraSensor.Background
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.3
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:201] ServerFixture load in 1.2 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
[Wrn] [msgs.cc:1831] Conversion of sensor type[wideanglecamera] not supported.
INTEGRATION_wideanglecamera_sensor: /build/ogre-1.9-mqY1wq/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/include/OgreAxisAlignedBox.h:252: void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(const Ogre::Vector3&, const Ogre::Vector3&): Assertion `(min.x <= max.x && min.y <= max.y && min.z <= max.z) && "The minimum corner of the box must be less than or equal to maximum corner"' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~

Partial backtrace:

~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff4808428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
#1  0x00007ffff480a02a in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff4800bd7 in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<optimized out>, assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ffff3905eb8 "(min.x <= max.x && min.y <= max.y && min.z <= max.z) && \"The minimum corner of the box must be less than or equal to maximum corner\"", file=file@entry=0x7ffff3905e60 "/build/ogre-1.9-mqY1wq/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/include/OgreAxisAlignedBox.h", line=line@entry=252, function=function@entry=0x7ffff39425a0 "void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(const Ogre::Vector3&, const Ogre::Vector3&)") at assert.c:92
#3  0x00007ffff4800c82 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7ffff3905eb8 "(min.x <= max.x && min.y <= max.y && min.z <= max.z) && \"The minimum corner of the box must be less than or equal to maximum corner\"", file=0x7ffff3905e60 "/build/ogre-1.9-mqY1wq/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/include/OgreAxisAlignedBox.h", line=252, function=0x7ffff39425a0 "void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(const Ogre::Vector3&, const Ogre::Vector3&)") at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ffff3785c56 in Ogre::Frustum::updateFrustumImpl() const () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#5  0x00007ffff378b725 in Ogre::Frustum::_notifyCurrentCamera(Ogre::Camera*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#6  0x00007ffff374a3fc in Ogre::RenderQueue::processVisibleObject(Ogre::MovableObject*, Ogre::Camera*, bool, Ogre::VisibleObjectsBoundsInfo*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#7  0x00007fffbbdf72e4 in Ogre::OctreeNode::_addToRenderQueue(Ogre::Camera*, Ogre::RenderQueue*, bool, Ogre::VisibleObjectsBoundsInfo*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.9.0/Plugin_OctreeSceneManager.so
#8  0x00007fffbbdf3c84 in Ogre::OctreeSceneManager::walkOctree(Ogre::OctreeCamera*, Ogre::RenderQueue*, Ogre::Octree*, Ogre::VisibleObjectsBoundsInfo*, bool, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.9.0/Plugin_OctreeSceneManager.so
#9  0x00007fffbbdf4131 in Ogre::OctreeSceneManager::_findVisibleObjects(Ogre::Camera*, Ogre::VisibleObjectsBoundsInfo*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.9.0/Plugin_OctreeSceneManager.so
#10 0x00007ffff367c25f in Ogre::SceneManager::_renderScene(Ogre::Camera*, Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#11 0x00007ffff36b8f51 in Ogre::Camera::_renderScene(Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#12 0x00007ffff365d77a in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateViewport(Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#13 0x00007ffff365d5cb in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateAutoUpdatedViewports(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#14 0x00007ffff365d11e in Ogre::RenderTarget::updateImpl() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#15 0x00007ffff365dac4 in Ogre::RenderTarget::update(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#16 0x00007ffff6e353f3 in gazebo::rendering::WideAngleCamera::RenderImpl (this=0x7fffc68494b0) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/WideAngleCamera.cc:696
#17 0x00007ffff6d3500c in gazebo::rendering::Camera::Render (this=0x7fffc68494b0, _force=<optimized out>) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc:426
#18 0x00007ffff76d0c68 in gazebo::sensors::CameraSensor::Render (this=0x7fff501550d0) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc:189
#19 0x00007ffff7711c6d in std::function<void ()>::operator()() const (this=<optimized out>) at /usr/include/c++/5/functional:2267
#20 gazebo::event::EventT<void ()>::Signal() (this=<optimized out>) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:299
#21 gazebo::event::EventT<void ()>::operator()() (this=<optimized out>) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:143
#22 gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::ImageSensorContainer::Update (this=0x7fffc4591ad0, _force=<optimized out>) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:698
#23 0x00007ffff77120f4 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update (this=this@entry=0x7ffff7969da0 <SingletonT<gazebo::sensors::SensorManager>::GetInstance()::t>, _force=_force@entry=false) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:171
#24 0x00007ffff770740a in gazebo::sensors::run_once (_force=_force@entry=false) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorsIface.cc:118
#25 0x00007ffff79875f0 in gazebo::Server::Run (this=0x7fffc4000930) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:573
#26 0x000000000043be3d in gazebo::ServerFixture::RunServer (this=0x764a50, _args=...) at /home/docker/ws/src/gazebo/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc:268
#27 0x00007ffff586a5d5 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.58.0
#28 0x00007ffff7bc170a in start_thread (arg=0x7fffcc1af700) at pthread_create.c:333

(gdb)

Full backtraces here:

* https://gist.github.com/scpeters/0f8b3320dd7b7fd7a866201e4f25d440
